Name: Facility 47
About the game: You wake up alone and freezing in an icy cell. You try the cell door but itâ€™s locked, it seems that you are stuck with no apparent escape. All that surrounds you is a letter and a bottle of pills, and no sign of how long you have been here or why! Escape from this room and you will begin a journey through an isolated research facility in the freezing depths of the Antarctic, solving exciting puzzles as you go and unlocking new locations around the Facility. A point and click, hidden object mystery thriller that encourages you to explore, investigate and search for the clues that will ultimately allow you to piece together the mysterious history of Facility 47 and how exactly you came to be there!
